title: Miranda Kerr on Motherhood, Her Modern Family, and Why She Proudly Calls Herself a “Turtle”
description:
Model and Kora Organics founder Miranda Kerr dishes on the art of a cheeky wink, her award-winning skincare line, and how she fell in love with Katy Perry.
